alert.note: Alert for Gasconade; Lincoln (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Saint Louis (Eastern Missouri and West Central Illinois)
info.headline: Flood Watch issued August 08 at 2:40PM CDT until August 08 at 3:30PM CDT by NWS Saint Louis
info.description: ...FLOOD WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT THROUGH LATE TONIGHT... * WHAT...Flash flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues to be possible. * WHERE...Portions of Illinois, including the following areas, Bond IL, Calhoun IL, Clinton IL, Fayette IL, Jersey IL, Macoupin IL, Madison IL, Marion IL, Monroe IL, Montgomery IL, Saint Clair and Washington IL. Portions of east central Missouri, including the following areas, Franklin MO, Gasconade MO, Jefferson MO, Lincoln MO, Saint Charles MO, Saint Louis City MO, Saint Louis MO and Warren MO. * WHEN...Through late tonight. * IMPACTS...Excessive runoff may result in flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - Slow moving and repeat thunderstorms are expected, resulting in rainfall amounts of 2 to 3 inches in a short time, and isolated rainfall totals of up to 5 inches.
info.instruction: You should monitor later forecasts and be prepared to take action should Flash Flood Warnings be issued.
